title: Nish Kumar (Films Of 2020 Special pt. 1 of 2) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #132
itunes:title: Nish Kumar (Films Of 2020 Special pt. 1 of 2) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #132
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe AND all the films of 2020 (at long last) with NISH KUMAR!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe AND all the films of 2020 (at long last) with NISH KUMAR!


You know what it is! A selection of films from the past year, selected by Brett and Nish for your agreement or argument! It’s marginally overdue but I think all waits can be forgiven, no? It’s a great one, and this is only part 1 - you have a whole other part to come so hold on - greatness is your gift! Enjoy. OH and spoilers all over the place. Tread carefully.


NISH KUMAR on THE INTERNET!

NISH on TWITTER!

NISH's 'THE MASH REPORT'!


BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on PATREON

FTBBW PODCAST MERCHANDISE

TED LASSO

SOULMATES

SUPERBOB - Brett's 2015 feature film

CORNERBOYS with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP


DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/filmstobeburiedwith.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
